Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Skull Mask# yields #a Piece of Heart#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Ganon's Castle Small Key Ring#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Strength Upgrade#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Purple Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Single Giant Pot

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS East Inner Room

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #a Red Rupee# and #Farore's Wind#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest
Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that ##Jabu Jabu's Belly## has #3# major items.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Trail# is a foolish choice.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #the Shadow Temple Boss Key#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Boulder Maze Side Room Chest

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to #Volvagia#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that beating Bongo Bongo quickly requires an even tempo.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that plundering #Zora's River# is a foolish choice.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals #2 Deku Scrubs#.

ToT (Right).text: I bet you'd like to have more bombs.
